decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered Location Plan, 1MW-17 01, 1MW-17 PA 05, 1MW-17 PA 06, 1MW-20 302A, 1MW-20 PA 303A, 1MW-20 PA 304A, 1MW-20 PA 305A, 1MW-20 PA 307A, 1MW-20 PA 308, Unnumbered drawings with view from South and North and Photographs. Received: 03/07/2024
Fire Statement. Received: 11/07/2024
1MW-18 PA 03. Received: 19/07/2024
1MW-18 PA 04. Received: 24/07/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.
description: Erection of an additional storey with a flat roof to the house and a projecting front bay window
